name: Moto Parkour
description:
Moto Parkour is an adrenaline-pumping game that will take you on a thrilling ride high above the clouds.

As the title suggests, the game is all about motorcycle parkour, where you will be riding a powerful bike on platforms suspended in mid-air. The game starts with you choosing your motorcycle from a range of options, each with its unique features and capabilities. Once you have selected your ride, you will be taken to the first level, where the real action begins.

Moto Parkour is a game that will test your skills, reflexes, and courage as you ride your motorcycle through the clouds, performing daring stunts and overcoming obstacles. Get ready for an exhilarating ride that will leave you wanting more.

Game Features :
- Multiple levels
- 3 different bikes (Max speed, Brake torque,Enginge torque)
- Earning coins
